org.datavec.api.transform.transform.string

Class StringListToIndicesNDArrayTransform

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.datavec.api.transform.transform.BaseTransform
      • org.datavec.api.transform.transform.string.StringListToCountsNDArrayTransform
        • org.datavec.api.transform.transform.string.StringListToIndicesNDArrayTransform
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, ColumnOp, Transform

    public class StringListToIndicesNDArrayTransform
extends StringListToCountsNDArrayTransform
    Converts String column into a sparse bag-of-words (BOW) represented as an NDArray of indices. Appropriate for embeddings or as efficient storage before being expanded into a dense array.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
